Title: Do you know how to make your PC fast?
Summary: If your PC is running slowly, these suggestions might help speed things up.
Author: Anhishek Singh
ListItems: 1. Make sure you have the latest updates for Windows and device drivers
2. Restart your PC and open only the apps you need
3. Use ReadyBoost to help improve performance
4. Make sure the system is managing the page file size
5. Check for low disk space and free up space
6. Adjust the appearance and performance of Windows
9. Check for and remove viruses and malware
10. Restore your PC from a system restore point

Title: Top 10 government sites
Summary: Essential government websites that provide valuable services and information.
Author: Anhishek Singh

Resources.Title: Digital India
Resources.Description: A campaign to ensure government services are made available to citizens electronically.

Resources.Title: e-Governance
Resources.Description: Promotes the use of information and communication technology in governance.

Resources.Title: PM Awas Yojana
Resources.Description: Housing for all by 2022, providing affordable housing to the urban poor.

Resources.Title: PM KISAN SAMMAN NIDHI
Resources.Description: Provides farmers with up to Rs.6,000 per year as minimum income support.

Resources.Title: National Portal of India
Resources.Description: Single-window access to information and services from all Government Departments.

Resources.Title: Science & Technology
Resources.Description: Information about India's scientific and technological developments.

Resources.Title: Health & Family Welfare
Resources.Description: Details about government health schemes and programs.

Resources.Title: Education
Resources.Description: Information about educational institutions, courses, and scholarships.

Resources.Title: Housing
Resources.Description: Information about India's housing industry and urban development.
